# FluentUI Blazor Documentation

> Comprehensive documentation collection for Fluent UI Blazor components (v4.12.1+dc098671) extracted from the official fluentui-blazor.net site. This repository serves as a curated documentation resource specifically designed to provide context to Large Language Models (LLMs) through GitMCP (Model Context Protocol). It enables AI assistants to have detailed knowledge of Fluent UI Blazor components, their APIs, usage patterns, and best practices.

This documentation covers all aspects of Microsoft's Fluent UI Blazor component library for .NET 9.0.6, including complete API coverage, real code examples, best practices, performance guidelines, and accessibility implementations. Each component includes parameters, methods, events, Razor syntax examples, and TypeScript-style implementations suitable for C# developers.

Key features include complete API coverage for all components, working Razor component examples, performance and accessibility guidelines, GitMCP optimization for AI assistant integration, up-to-date information based on the latest stable release, well-structured navigation, and copy-paste ready code examples.

## Quick Start

- [README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/README.md): Complete overview, component list, and GitMCP integration guide
- [Code Setup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/1.%20Getting%20Started/1.1%20Code%20Setup.md): Installation, configuration, and project setup
- [Project Templates](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/1.%20Getting%20Started/1.2%20Project%20templates.md): Blazor project templates with Fluent UI

## Core Components

- [Button](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.8%20Button/4.8.1%20Button.md): Standard button component with appearances and events
- [MenuButton](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.8%20Button/4.8.2%20MenuButton.md): Button with dropdown menu functionality
- [Card](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.9%20Card.md): Container component for content grouping
- [Dialog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.11%20Dialog.md): Modal dialog component with full API
- [Icon](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.18%20Icon.md): Icon component with Fluent UI icon library
- [Tabs](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.37%20Tabs.md): Tabbed navigation component
- [Toast](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.38%20Toast.md): Notification toast system with service injection
- [TreeView](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.40%20Tree%20View.md): Hierarchical tree navigation
- [Wizard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.41%20Wizard.md): Multi-step wizard component

## Forms and Input Components

- [Forms Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.1%20Overview.md): Form validation and binding patterns
- [TextField](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.14%20Text%20Field.md): Single-line text input with validation
- [TextArea](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.13%20TextArea.md): Multi-line text input
- [Checkbox](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.2%20Checkbox.md): Checkbox input with two and three-state support
- [Select](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.5%20Lists/3.5.4%20Select.md): Dropdown selection component
- [Autocomplete](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.5%20Lists/3.5.1%20Autocomplete.md): Auto-completing input field
- [Radio](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.7%20Radio.md): Radio button component
- [Switch](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.12%20Switch.md): Toggle switch component
- [Slider](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.11%20Slider.md): Range slider input
- [Date and Time](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/3.%20Forms%20And%20Inputs/3.3%20Date%20and%20Time.md): Date and time picker components

## Layout Components

- [Stack](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/2.%20Layout/2.9%20Stack.md): Flex-based layout container with orientation and gap control
- [Grid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/2.%20Layout/2.4%20Grid.md): CSS Grid layout system
- [Splitter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/2.%20Layout/2.7%20Splitter.md): Resizable content splitter
- [Spacer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/2.%20Layout/2.6%20Spacer.md): Flexible spacing utility
- [Header](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/2.%20Layout/2.1%20Header.md): Page header component
- [Footer](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/2.%20Layout/2.2%20Footer.md): Page footer component

## DataGrid Components

- [DataGrid Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.10%20Data%20grid/4.10.1%20Overview.md): Advanced data table features overview
- [Getting Started](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.10%20Data%20grid/4.10.2%20Getting%20Started.md): Basic DataGrid setup and configuration
- [Template Columns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.10%20Data%20grid/4.10.15%20Template%20Columns.md): Custom column templates
- [Virtualized Grid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.10%20Data%20grid/4.10.17%20Virtualized%20Grid.md): Performance optimization for large datasets
- [Remote Data](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.10%20Data%20grid/4.10.18%20Remote%20Data.md): Server-side data loading patterns

## Navigation Components

- [NavMenu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.24%20NavMenu.md): Main navigation menu component
- [NavMenuTree](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.25%20NavMenuTree.md): Hierarchical navigation menu
- [Menu](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.21%20Menu.md): Context menu and dropdown menu
- [Breadcrumb](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.7%20Breadcrumb.md): Navigation breadcrumb trail

## Styling and Theming

- [Themes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/1.%20Getting%20Started/1.3%20Themes.md): Theme system, dark/light modes, and custom themes
- [Design Tokens](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/1.%20Getting%20Started/1.4%20Design%20Tokens.md): Complete design token system and customization
- [Reboot CSS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/1.%20Getting%20Started/1.5%20Reboot%20CSS.md): CSS reset and normalization
- [Icons and Emoji](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/1.%20Getting%20Started/1.6%20Using%20Icons%20and%20Emoji.md): Icon library usage and emoji support

## Optional

- [Accordion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.2%20Accordion.md): Expandable content sections
- [Badge Components](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.6%20Badge/4.6.1%20Badge.md): Badge, CounterBadge, and PresenceBadge
- [MessageBar](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.22%20MessageBar.md): Inline message notifications
- [Progress](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.31%20Progress.md): Linear progress indicators
- [ProgressRing](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.32%20Progress%20Ring.md): Circular progress indicators
- [Toolbar](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.39%20Toolbar.md): Action toolbar component
- [Tooltip](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.40%20ToolTip.md): Hover tooltip component
- [Persona](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.28%20Persona.md): User profile display component
- [Popover](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.29%20Popover.md): Popup content overlay
- [Flipper](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.15%20Flipper.md): Content navigation flipper
- [Overflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.26%20Overflow.md): Content overflow handling
- [Skeleton](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.34%20Skeleton.md): Loading placeholder skeletons
- [Drag and Drop](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.13%20Drag%20and%20Drop.md): Drag and drop functionality
- [Sortable List](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.35%20Sortable%20List.md): Drag-to-reorder list component
- [SplashScreen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/4.%20Components/4.36%20SplashScreen.md): Application loading screen
- [Blazor Hybrid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ibrahimhuycn/FluentUiBlazorDocs/main/1.%20Getting%20Started/1.7%20Blazor%20Hybrid.md): Hybrid app development guidance
